CustomField.formula: CASE( Material_Description__c , "IGO 50ppm", 1, "IGO 1000ppm", 2, "IGO 10ppm", 3,"AGO B7", 4,"AGO B0", 5,"AGO B0 CH", 6,"AGO VPD", 7,"GTL B0", 8,"GTL B7", 9,"ULG95 E5", 11,"ULG95 E10", 10,"ULG98", 12,"ULG95_BOB_E5", 13,"ULG95_BOB_E10", 14,"ULG95 E0", 15,"ULG100 VP", 16,"AVGAS", 17,18)
CustomField.label: MRC Grade Sort
